trans-unit.source: A control that displays a link to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: 會將連結顯示至另一個網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control to create a link to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項來建立另一個網頁的連結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is typically displayed as text specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項通常會顯示為指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It can also be displayed as an image specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也顯示與所指定的映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: If the image is unavailable, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property also becomes the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性也會變成工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control on a Web page that links to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制在網頁上連結至另一個網頁。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>類別。

trans-unit.source: The output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: 要在用戶端呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Adds the attributes of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control to the output stream for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項的屬性加入至輸出資料流以便呈現。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method in a custom server control so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> text is displayed in a bold font.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.AddAttributesToRender%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>文字會以粗體字顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following Web Form uses the custom server control to display a hyperlink with a bold font.
trans-unit.target: 下列 Web 表單會使用自訂的伺服器控制項來顯示粗體字型的超連結。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: 代表已剖析項目的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 通知控制項有項目已被解析，並將項目加入至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂控制項時，這個方法使用主要由控制項開發人員，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the input object is a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control has no child controls, then the input object is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入的物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項沒有任何子控制項，然後輸入的物件用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class is called and the specified object is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A>方法的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別稱為和指定的物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>, and to an empty string otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.AddParsedSubObject%2A>中自訂方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>伺服器控制，好讓它永遠設定已剖析的物件文字屬性，文字屬性的已剖析的物件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>，並為空字串否則為。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the hyperlink when the hyperlink is an image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定超連結為影像時超連結的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the hyperlink image.
trans-unit.target: 超連結影像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項的影像的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the image to display for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項之影像的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control can be displayed as text or an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項可以顯示為文字或影像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify an image to display for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: If the image is unavailable, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property also becomes the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性也會變成工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the path to the image to display.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示之影像的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the hyperlink when the hyperlink is an image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定超連結為影像時超連結的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the hyperlink image.
trans-unit.target: 超連結影像的寬度。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: 包含先前儲存之狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從使用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的先前要求來還原檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to link to when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項時所要連結的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to link to when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項時所要連結的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ('').
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性指定的 URL 導覽時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to link to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性來指定要時連結 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: 要在用戶端呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control on a page.
trans-unit.target: 在網頁上顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.RenderContents%2A> method in a custom server control so that some text is appended to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.RenderContents%2A>方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一些文字附加至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <see langword="disabled" /> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" /> 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 <see langword="disabled" /> 屬性設為 "disabled"。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" /> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than <c>4.0</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" />屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於<c>4.0</c>，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項時顯示所連結之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目標視窗或框架，載入當按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項時所連結的 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of a through z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.
trans-unit.target: 除了下列以底線為開頭的特殊值以外，該值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> 呈現父代的 即時運算框架組中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> 轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> 呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> 呈現框架不完整的視窗中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <see langword="_search" /> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 <see langword="_search" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the <see langword="_search" /> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 <see langword="_search" /> 目標值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A> property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁的連結時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The Web page is specified by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上設定，來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，在瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗會重新整理時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A> property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A>屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A> property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 請勿設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A>屬性如果轉譯的輸出為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A>指向另一個視窗中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame to display the page associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示與相關聯的頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The text caption for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink" /> 控制項的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control can be displayed as text or an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項可以顯示為文字或影像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property to specify the text to display for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: If the image is unavailable, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property also becomes the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性也會變成工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property to specify the text to display for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控制項。
